description._content: Image taken from: Title: "John L. Stoddard's Lectures [on his travels]. Illustrated ... with views of the worlds famous places and people, etc" Author: STODDARD, John Lawson. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 010026.i.4." Volume: 05 Page: 232 Place of Publishing: Chicago Date of Publishing: 1897 Publisher: Belford & Middlebrook Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003510759 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
